details.title: Assistant Professor
paragraphs: Conducted laboratory classes and practical training in Geographic Information Systems (GIS), digital cartography, and Earth remote sensing. Guided students in spatial data processing, geospatial analysis, and cartographic visualization using modern tools.

Participated in scientific research and contributed to academic publications. Completed part-time PhD studies and carried out original research in theory and methods of vocational training. In 2018, successfully defended a PhD in Pedagogical Sciences.

details.title: Entrepreneur / Business Owner
paragraphs: Founded and managed multiple ventures in hospitality and craft beer, including three restaurant establishments and a private brewery. Oversaw concept, supply chains, quality control, and team operations.
Introduced process optimization and elements of automation in production and logistics, combining creativity with a systematic approach to ensure high standards and sustainable growth.
